message.entry: Words must be a string vector or cell array of character vectors.
Words must not contain embedded newlines and must be under 1000 characters long.
Sizes must be a vector of nonnegative real values.
Words must be a string vector, a cell array of character vectors, or a categorical vector.

wordcloud requires Text Analytics Toolbox(TM) for string, character, or cell array input without size data. Alternatively, convert the text data to a categorical array of words, or specify both the words and size data and use the syntax wordcloud(WORDS,SIZEDATA). For an example showing how to create word clouds from string arrays, see wordcloud.
To deploy apps using word clouds, replace ''wordcloud(STR)'' with ''tbl=wordCloudCounts(STR); wordcloud(tbl.Word,tbl.Count)''.
''WordData'', ''SizeData'' and ''Color'' properties must have compatible sizes.
''Color'' must be an N-by-3 matrix where N is either 1 or the number of words.
Parent container must be a valid figure, uipanel, or uitab.
''SourceTable'' value must be a table compatible with ''WordVariable'' and ''SizeVariable'' property values.
''WordVariable'' and ''SizeVariable'' property values must be variables in the ''SourceTable'' table.
Not enough input arguments. Table argument must be followed by 2 table subscripts.

entry.note: {0} is a property name, such as SourceTable

message.entry: Setting the ''{0}'' property after setting the ''WordData'' or ''SizeData'' property is not supported.

entry.note: {0} is a property name, such as WordData

message.entry: Setting the ''{0}'' property after setting the ''SourceTable'' property is not supported.
Maximum number of words to display
